original: Åström, Valfrid, landsfiskal, Skara, f. 12/7/88 i Bjurholm, Västerb. 1., av Joihan Ä. o. Augusta Mårtensson. G. 21 m. Astrid Sjöberg. Barn: Anna-Lenaih f. 22, Hans 24, Greta 24, Sigrid 28. — Realex. i Nyköp. 09, kronolänis-m:ex. i Umeå 12. Landsfiskal i Sten-siele 17-33, i Skara fr. 33. Styr:led. i Skarab. 1. sparb. 44, ordf. i drätsel-kamm. 45, led. av stadsfullm. (h) fr. 47. RVO.
translated: Åström, Valfrid, district prosecutor, Skara, born on the 12th of July, 1888 in Bjurholm, Västerbotten County, son of Joihan Ä. and Augusta Mårtensson. Married on the 21st to Astrid Sjöberg. Children: Anna-Lenaih born in 1922, Hans in 1924, Greta in 1924, Sigrid in 1928. Completed Realexamen in Nyköping in 1909, became a provincial military officer in Umeå in 1912. Served as a district prosecutor in Stenskär from 1917 to 1933, and in Skara from 1933. Member of the Board of Directors in Skaraborg County Savings Bank since 1944, chairman of the finance committee in 1945, member of the city council (conservative party) since 1947. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
